languages.text: "Домин'{name}... наши судьбы связаны. Мы движемся в одном лабиринте. Скажи... какое бы решение избрал{mf||а} ты, если бы метания разума твоего лишали тебя остроты намерения и безукоризненности духа?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла закрывает глаза и глубоко вздыхает.{/n} "Эним'{name}... наши судьбы связаны. Мы движемся в одном лабиринте. Скажи мне... какое бы решение избрал{mf||а} ты, если бы метания разума твоего лишали тебя остроты намерения и безукоризненности духа?"

languages.text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}... наши судьбы связаны. Мы движемся в одном лабиринте. Скажи... какое бы решение избрал{mf||а} ты, если бы метания разума твоего лишали тебя остроты намерения и безукоризненности духа?"

traits.locale_text: "Enim'{name}... Our fates are connected. We walk in the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you choose if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
"Enim'{name}... Our fates are connected. We walk in the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you choose if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
"Enim'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
"Enim'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
"Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
"Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

languages.text: "Domin'{name} ... unsere Schicksale ist miteinander verwoben. Wir irren durch dasselbe Labyrinth. Sagt ... was würdet Ihr tun, wenn die Sorgen Eures Verstands Eure Entschlossenheit abschwächen und Euren Geist verletzen würden?"
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name} ... unsere Schicksale ist miteinander verwoben. Wir irren durch dasselbe Labyrinth. Sagt ... was würdet Ihr tun, wenn die Sorgen Eures Verstands Eure Entschlossenheit abschwächen und Euren Geist verletzen würden?"

languages.text: «Domin'{name}... nuestros destinos están unidos. Recorremos el mismo laberinto. Dígame... ¿qué haría si sus preocupaciones mellaran su determinación y obnubilaran su espíritu?».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}... nuestros destinos están unidos. Recorremos el mismo laberinto. Dígame... ¿qué haría si sus preocupaciones mellaran su determinación y obnubilaran su espíritu?».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}…私たちの運命はつながっているわ。私たちは同じ迷宮を歩いている。教えてちょうだい…自分の心の悩みが決意を鈍らせ、魂を傷つけるとしたら、あなたはどうする？」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

traits.locale_text: 「エニム・{name}…私たちの運命はつながっているわ。私たちは同じ迷宮を歩いている。教えてちょうだい…自分の心の悩みが決意を鈍らせ、魂を傷つけるとしたら、あなたはどうする？」

languages.text: “秘者{name}……我们的命运紧密相连，我们走在同一座迷宫里。告诉我……如果你心中的烦恼削弱了你的精神，动摇了你的决心，你会怎么做？”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}……我们的命运紧密相连，我们走在同一座迷宫里。告诉我……如果你心中的烦恼削弱了你的精神，动摇了你的决心，你会怎么做？”

languages.text: « Domin'{name}... Nos destins sont liés. Nous déambulons dans le même labyrinthe. Dites-moi... que feriez-vous si le trouble qui agite votre esprit venait à émousser votre détermination et à vous démoraliser ? »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"

traits.locale_text: « Domin'{name}... Nos destins sont liés. Nous déambulons dans le même labyrinthe. Dites-moi... que feriez-vous si le trouble qui agite votre esprit venait à émousser votre détermination et à vous démoraliser ? »

languages.text: "Domin'{name}... Kaderlerimiz birbirine bağlı. İkimiz de aynı labirentte yürüyoruz. Söylesene... Zihnindeki endişeler, mantığını köreltip ruhuna zarar verse ne yapardın?"
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}... our fates are connected. We walk the same labyrinth. Tell me... what would you do if your mind's worries were to dull your resolve and mar your spirit?"
